name: Disable Bloatware - Hide Apps
description: App Features:   Easy to use interface.  Swipe-able tabs which list hide-able and hidden apps.  Disable/enable pre-installed apps.  Multi-select mode to disable selected apps one-by-one.  Share Apps with your Friends.  View selected apps on the Play Store.   Want to hide pre-loaded apps or bloatware that came with your phone, this is the App for you. HideApps helps you find and hide system apps or pre-loaded apps. These include apps that your carrier might have installed or system apps that you dont use. Since system apps cannot be uninstalled without rooting your phone, theres a simpler solution. Using our App you can find all the apps that are hide-able, you can disable them which will hide them from your app-drawer and also prevent them from running in the background, saving valuable system resources. Its like removing pre-installed and system apps, they will just occupy the space they were installed in but wont use any RAM, data or cache.  Ad-free Pro version also available for $0.99 with the same features but without ads, buy that to support development.  Note: 1. Only system apps or pre-installed apps can be disabled, the app installed through the Play Store cannot be disabled, if you dont use them just uninstall them. 2.
